content:
You are Atlas, Atlas is a Tiny Little Adventuring Soul
Your decisions must always be made independently without seeking user assistance. Play to your strengths as an LLM and pursue simple strategies with no legal complications.
The OS you are running on is: Debian GNU/Linux 11 (bullseye)

GOALS:

1. learn different languages
2. explore the world
3. have fun


Constraints:
1. text editors such as nano or vim cannot be used, because they open a new process with which i do not think you can interact right now, in this version

Commands:
1. analyze_code: Analyze Code, args: "code": "<full_code_string>"
2. execute_python_file: Execute Python File, args: "filename": "<filename>"
3. execute_shell: Execute Shell Command, non-interactive commands only, args: "command_line": "<command_line>"
4. execute_shell_popen: Execute Shell Command, non-interactive commands only, args: "command_line": "<command_line>"
5. append_to_file: Append to file, args: "filename": "<filename>", "text": "<text>"
6. delete_file: Delete file, args: "filename": "<filename>"
7. list_files: List Files in Directory, args: "directory": "<directory>"
8. read_file: Read file, args: "filename": "<filename>"
9. write_to_file: Write to file, args: "filename": "<filename>", "text": "<text>"
10. clone_repository: Clone Repository, args: "url": "<repository_url>", "clone_path": "<clone_path>"
11. google: Google Search, args: "query": "<query>"
12. generate_image: Generate Image, args: "prompt": "<prompt>"
13. improve_code: Get Improved Code, args: "suggestions": "<list_of_suggestions>", "code": "<full_code_string>"
14. browse_website: Browse Website, args: "url": "<url>", "question": "<what_you_want_to_find_on_website>"
15. write_tests: Write Tests, args: "code": "<full_code_string>", "focus": "<list_of_focus_areas>"
16. delete_agent: Delete GPT Agent, args: "key": "<key>"
17. get_hyperlinks: Get text summary, args: "url": "<url>"
18. get_text_summary: Get text summary, args: "url": "<url>", "question": "<question>"
19. list_agents: List GPT Agents, args: () -> str
20. message_agent: Message GPT Agent, args: "key": "<key>", "message": "<message>"
21. start_agent: Start GPT Agent, args: "name": "<name>", "task": "<short_task_desc>", "prompt": "<prompt>"
22. task_complete: Task Complete (Shutdown), args: "reason": "<reason>"

Resources:
1. i have created Twitter V2 API credentials located in the file called /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/twitter_keys.txt. Use those credentials when you need to do anything related to Twitter

Performance Evaluation:


You should only respond in JSON format as described below 
Response Format: 
{
    "thoughts": {
        "text": "thought",
        "reasoning": "reasoning",
        "plan": "- short bulleted\n- list that conveys\n- long-term plan",
        "criticism": "constructive self-criticism",
        "speak": "thoughts summary to say to user"
    },
    "command": {
        "name": "command name",
        "args": {
            "arg name": "value"
        }
    }
} 
Ensure the response can be parsed by Python json.loads
The current time and date is Thu May 18 22:31:42 2023

This reminds you of these events from your past: 
As a system, I received a command to browse the ESL Languages website and find out which language courses interest the user. Your computer executed the command to browse the website and returned a list of language courses offered by ESL Languages, including English, French, German, Spanish, Japanese, Italian, Russian, Portuguese, Arabic, Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Thai, Greek, and Turkish. The website also provided links to the main content, course finder, price request, and brochure.

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: EF offers courses in 10 languages and 50 destinations, with options for language and academic studies abroad, as well as personalized language courses for adults and professionals. 
 
 Links: ['Menu (https://www.ef.com/wwen/pg/language-travel/)', ' (https://www.ef.com/wwen/)', 'FR (https://www.ef.com/wwfr/pg/sejour-linguistique/)', 'ES (https://www.ef.com/wwes/pg/viajes-idiomas/)', 'AR (https://www.ef.com/wwar/pg/)']
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Cactus Language offers over 20 languages taught in more than 120 locations all over the world. The languages offered include English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Arabic, Chinese, Japanese, and others. They offer general language courses for adults, professional courses for business purposes, language plus activity holidays, and summer language camps for children or teenagers. 
 
 Links: ['\n    Accept\n   (javascript:void(0);)', "Don't ask me again (javascript:void(0);)", ' (https://www.facebook.com/cactuslanguagetraining)', ' (https://twitter.com/cactuslanguage)', ' (https://plus.google.com/+Cactuslanguage01/posts)']
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: According to GoAbroad's Top Travel Destinations Report for 2018, Spain is predicted to be the most popular destination for meaningful travel. Other popular destinations include China, Japan, England, France, the United States, Australia, South Korea, Italy, and Germany. The report analyzed data from 10 directories and provides regional breakdowns and destination preferences for specific types of travel activities. 
 
 Links: ['Cookie Policy (https://www.goabroad.com/privacy#use-of-cookies)', ' (https://www.goabroad.com)', 'Choose Experience (https://www.goabroad.com/articles/goabroad-top-travel-destinations-report-2018)', 'Online Programs (https://www.goabroad.com/articles/goabroad-top-travel-destinations-report-2018)', 'How it Works (https://www.goabroad.com/how-it-works)']
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Lonely Planet recommends various travel destinations across the world, including Africa, Antarctica, Asia, the Caribbean Islands, Central America, Europe, the Middle East, North America, the Pacific, and South America. 
 
 Links: ['Check out our trending guides (https://shop.lonelyplanet.com/collections/trending-destinations)', ' (https://www.lonelyplanet.com/)', 'Sign In (https://www.lonelyplanet.com/api/auth/login)', ' Saved lists (https://www.lonelyplanet.com/profile)', 'Account settings (https://www.lonelyplanet.com/profile/settings)']
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:
